sentences.en: a new wave of immigrants from the Middle East
sentences.cn: 来自中东的一股新兴的移民浪潮

sentences.en: Applicants for immigrant visas must pay an additional $ 75 charge.
sentences.cn: 移民签证申请者必须支付额外的75美元.

sentences.en: But "the hostile part can be mobilized from time to time, " by what he calls "anti-immigrant entrepreneurs.
sentences.cn: 但是“敌对的那部分可能会不时地动员”，以他称之为“反移民企业家”的名义。

sentences.en: But “the hostile part can be mobilized from time to time,” by what he calls “anti-immigrant entrepreneurs.
sentences.cn: 但是“敌对的那部分可能会不时地动员”，以他称之为“反移民企业家”的名义。

sentences.en: Has Anyone Ever Filed an immigrant Visa Petition on Your Behalf?
sentences.cn: 以前有人代表你的提出移民签证的申请么?。

sentences.en: One recent Fuling immigrant is 40 - year - old Zheng Xiaoyun.
sentences.cn: 40 岁 的郑晓云(音译)最近刚迁入涪陵.

sentences.en: That such a woman would want more for her daughter than someone who was a failed boxer, a doorman, and an illegal immigrant seemed to him perfectly reasonable.
sentences.cn: 在他看来，这样一个女人想要给自己的女儿找一个比失败的拳击手、看门人和非法移民更好的男人，是完全合理的。

sentences.en: The good news is that the anti-immigrant message may not play as well in Florida in the general election.
sentences.cn: 好消息是，在整个选举过程中，反移民信息的作用可能不会像在佛罗里达那么显著。

trans.tran_en: someone who enters another country to live there permanently
